org.jawin.win32.COINIT

org.jawin.win32   
 

Uses of COINIT in org.jawin.win32
 

Fields in org.jawin.win32 declared as COINIT
static COINIT COINIT.MULTITHREADED
          multi-threaded object concurrency
static COINIT COINIT.APARTMENTTHREADED
          apartment/single-threaded object concurrency
static COINIT COINIT.DISABLE_OLE1DDE
          Disables DDE for Ole1 support
static COINIT COINIT.SPEED_OVER_MEMORY
          Trades memory for speed
 

Methods in org.jawin.win32 with parameters of type COINIT
static void Ole32.CoInitialize(COINIT coinit)
          Initializes the COM library for use by the calling thread, sets the thread's concurrency model to coinit, and creates a new apartment for the thread if one is required.
